ppy/osu.summary: Recent activities include a pull request to populate metadata from ID3 tags when changing beatmap audio track in the editor, a rewrite of the Rhythm Skill within osu!taiko, and a push to implement a bell curve into diffcalcutils. These changes aim to improve the accuracy of rhythm difficulty calculation, introduce new rhythm data classes, and provide bonuses to near-1 ratio's.

ppy/osu-framework.summary: Recent activity includes a pull request to update the FFmpeg build to use the macos-13 CI image, replacing the deprecated macos-12 image, which had been disabled. This change ensures that macOS jobs can start again and is expected to provide better compatibility with older macOS versions.
